txt.en: 'A farm can only grow food as good as the land it is upon. We should take three of our fields and cover them with premium peat and fertilizer, one for pipe-weed, one for grains, and one for vegetables, then allow the best of our farmers to grow their crops there.'
'Hytbold is one step closer to being rebuilt and restored.'
Farmhouse of the Sutcrofts: Superior Farmland
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
There is much work to do to rebuild the town of Hytbold.
Bring the Tokens of Hytbold to Hereswith
